CONTACT_SUBTITLE: We are ready for all your questions!
HOME_TITLE: Good for business, good for nature
HOME_SUBTITLE: Griffon digester for food scraps and food waste disposal
TECH_SUBTITLE: Delivering sustainable solutions for food waste management
TECH_CONTENT_TITLE: Turning Food Waste Into a Clean and Sustainable Resource
TECH_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Innovation that drives efficiency and environmental responsibility
TECH_ITEM1_DESC: Food scraps are collected into bins and loaded into the device on your location
TECH_ITEM2_DESC: Special mixture of microorganisms is added to the device, where the mixture is aerated
TECH_ITEM3_DESC: Organic matter breaks down into wastewater
TECH_ITEM4_DESC: Wastewater is filtered and released through existing water infrastructure
PRODUCTS_SUBTITLE: Explore our range of Griffon digesters for every need
BENEFIT2_DESC: Reduced amounts of food waste. Reduced charges.
BENEFIT3_DESC: No transport of waste. Reduced emissions of CO2.
BENEFIT4_DESC: No methane emitted from landfills. No leaching to waterways.
BENEFIT5_DESC: No unpleasant odors which attract flies and rodents.
BENEFIT6_DESC: Do more for the environment and your business.
INDUSTRIES_DESC: Our Griffon digesters provide sustainable food waste solutions across a wide range of industries. From hotels, restaurants, and commercial kitchens, to hospitals, schools, supermarkets, airports, and cruise ships - we help businesses reduce waste, cut costs, and lower their environmental footprint.
EXPLORE_SUBTITLE: Find the perfect solution for your business
PRODUCTS_HEADER_SUBTITLE: Innovative digesters designed to reduce food waste.
PRODUCT_NOTE: *depending on the composition and type of food
PRODUCT1_IDEAL_FOR: Ideal for: small venues - small restaurants, bistros, clubs and pubs
PRODUCT1_FEATURE1: Depending on the composition of food residues, it aerobically processes up to 50kg of food per day
PRODUCT1_FEATURE5: The door safety mechanism automatically stops the appliance as soon as the door is opened
PRODUCT2_IDEAL_FOR: Ideal for: small venues - small restaurants, bistros, clubs and pubs
PRODUCT2_FEATURE1: Depending on the composition of food residues, it aerobically processes an average of 149 kg of food per day
PRODUCT2_FEATURE5: The door safety mechanism automatically stops the appliance as soon as the door is opened
PRODUCT3_IDEAL_FOR: Ideal for: smaller and medium venues - boutique hotels, restaurants, grocery shops…
PRODUCT3_FEATURE1: Depending on the composition of food residues, it processes an average of 249 kg of food per day aerobically
PRODUCT3_FEATURE5: Door safety mechanism automatically stops the device as soon as the door opens
PRODUCT4_IDEAL_FOR: Ideal for: medium and large facilities - hotels, catering services, hospitals, nursery homes, stadiums…
PRODUCT4_FEATURE1: Depending on the composition of food residues, it processes an average of 499 kg of food per day aerobically
PRODUCT4_FEATURE5: Door safety mechanism automatically stops the device as soon as the door opens
PRODUCT5_IDEAL_FOR: Ideal for: large facilities like hospitals, shopping malls, wholesale fruit and vegetables…
PRODUCT5_FEATURE1: Depending on the composition of food residues, it aerobically processes an average of 999 kg of food per day
PRODUCT5_FEATURE5: The door safety mechanism automatically stops the appliance as soon as the door is opened
